summary: Geethanjali, who is already the girlfriend of the college rowdy Ajay, is pursued by the free spirited and Arya. Arya relentlessly tries to woo Geethanjali causing problems between him and Ajay.
cast: Allu Arjun|Anuradha Mehta|Siva Balaji|Rajan P. Dev|Vidya|Devi Charan|Subbaraju|Venu Madhav|Babloo|Suneel|Ramana Murthi J.V.
keywords: character name as title|one word title|love|peer pressure|stones
title: Arya
